name: greenhouse construction, plastic walls and roof, plastic tubes | greenhouse, plastic walls and roof | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14939/documentation

This dataset represents the production and dismantling of 1 m2 of greenhouse with plastic walls and roof and plastic tubes.;This double-layer air-inflated film greenhouse is made of a structure of plastic pipes, covered with a double EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) copolymer sheet. The plastic cover must be replaced every 4 years. The greenhouse structure lifetime is typically 25 years. It comprises of a heating system and fume condenser. Such greenhouses represent recent technology (after 2002) and typically cover large surfaces (7 ha in average). A network of polypropylene pipes is used to deliver heat (hot water at 50-80Â°C), on the ground (thermo-siphon) and at the height of the plants (growth pipes). A boiler is used to store hot water. CO2 from combustion is recovered and injected again into the greenhouse as to increase photosynthesis. The greenhouse also includes a fertigation system made of a network of polyethylene pipes. Other auxiliary facilities are also considered.

This activity starts with the production of materials used to build the greenhouse and permanent technical infrastructure.

This dataset includes the production of the greenhouse as well as the permanent technical infrastructure. For the greenhouse are included its bearing structure (plastic tubes) and covering materials (plastic covers). Technical infrastrctucture includes heating and cooling systems, fertigation system, CO2 injection system, storage facilities and permanent working equipments such as trolley systems.
The activity ends with the disposal and recycling of all the materials.
category: F:Construction/41:Construction of buildings/410:Construction of buildings/4100:Construction of buildings
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period referring to the data source: 2005-2009. Based on expert opinion data is considered to be valid at least up to 2012.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Dataset is adapted from AGRIBALYSE 1.2 database, with land occupation and transformation flows removed (these are accounted for in the crop datasets). Data was collected from French manufacturers and reported in Boulard et al. (2011).
Translated name: Serre double parrois gonflee, BRM.

exchanges.description: Greenhouse used for agricultural production. This greenhouse has plastic walls and roof, structure is made of plastic tubes. Reference flow is 1 m2 used over 1 year.
